p: Even if the focus of the paper is on the possibility of extracting a symptoms-based data-driven definition of ILI that is country specific, the forecasting capabilities of the framework represent an additional strengthening factor (the forecasting potential of using participatory surveillance data, in combination with additional epidemiological signals has also been explored in a previous paper [ 29]). To further assess the robustness of the forecasts produced by the NMF framework, we have compared their accuracy with respect to a null model in two different ways.
